title: I am 100% confident in saying Gatekeeper Galio is now the coolest skin in the game
body:
Aside from being fucking gorgeous to look at, with amazing particles and a kickass recall, his VO is incredibly deep and complex and is a huge love letter to the Divine Comedy, especially Inferno. Thank you Riot. Did you at all actually research Dante while making the skin? I wouldn't be surprised, because there are some pretty clever allusions there, and I can tell his taunts towards specific champions will be thematically appropriate to the nine rings.

Gatekeeper Galio was one of the first skins I ever purchased, but I always felt let down because it never lived up to its 1820 pricetag. Now I am beyond ecstatic I own the skin. Gj Rito wp

https://youtu.be/LWJ2J0A1ins

https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-tAFzb7wMZs0/WL8q1JcICYI/AAAAAAAAfcI/HYTxZvLJHn4WUSWTAMKmbWO_h4Cvc77CgCEw/s640/galio4.jpg
https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-BpdHHhEaTNA/WL8q1XLsssI/AAAAAAAAfcU/TWD0INrVX8cP-EnEe53sSDMfdmgHgGeZwCEw/s640/galio4turn.jpg
https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-nd6ebbX7x2I/WL8q1Fd520I/AAAAAAAAfcM/JqwFcPwbql8a6B-Hg4GsJoq3hEbQMKlfQCEw/s640/galio4recall.jpg

replies.body:
I was impressed by the VO, but DAMN those particle effects are AWESOME!

It is an AMAZING skin indeed!

Edit: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=CVaFyTlLYZU
You might even say its Legendary :)

Really? In comparison to Galio feeling fresh, Gatekeeper doesn't feel legendary in comparison. Too many shared animations(taunt, dance, etc) for a Legendary in 2017.. but the same thing happened with other old legendaries reworked, Firefighter Tristana comes to mind. It's A REALLY GOOD skin, but not something I'd pay 1820 these days for and since I don't own it and there's bargain Galio skins that feel pretty awesome too coming out.. I dunno.. I have this problem with a lot of VGUs.. the 520s seem crazy bargain and the more expensive ones seem like kind of a rip, only because the standard bar of all the skins of the champion is brought up so much. Sorry for the mini-rant, It's really good and the work on it is amazing. I just wish all skins were able to come down price-tiers over time. Locking them in because of expectations is just weird.

the rework team just doesn't have the budget to bring it up to modern legendary standards. but its pretty damn good. I don't really care if the dance is the same personally, the voice over and recall are the things you feel the most

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=VW6f6XOlxb0&t=1s

Completely unrelated. But I saw your name, and was curious if you knew this existed.

"I'm just a boy who loves his mother, is that so wrong?"

He shares a quote with Morde actually.

"Misery loves company."

Why riot? Why? 

Good thing I already own that skin
That quote is also with Evelynn, is it not?
A lot of lines are shared among shadow isles champions, and branch out to a few others/skins.
And one of the altars in Twisted Treeline
Bind Mlown.
Oh you, just take the updoot. Meme Lord himself.
YOU FACE GALIO, EREDAR GATEKEEPER OF THE BURNING LEGION!

YOU ARE NOT PREPARED

melledoneus and mira enthe have always been my favorites

Aw, thanks!
Is it bad I only know that because I have the Jaraxxus card in Hearthstone, and I don't actually play WoW even remotely?
That's how I know it
Yes.
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=NhVvOps3C6s

"HA HA HA, rectal impalements all around!"

Gatekeeper Galio, bless his VO.
Yah that one made me chuckle and then sit in silence and wonder what the VO team does in its free time

True ...

If I had free time, I probably would to.

Like, where did that line even come from?
Wrong, original commando galio WAS the best skin, his splash art had the whole "deal with it" vibe. Now that, along with my favorite champ (and name) are completely fucked. Fucking shit devs.
Not to be rude but they probably did piss off a few people while updating Galio. But they also made millions happy. So like... they probably don't care tbh
Those few people are the same who play other niche champs, and the same who play offbuilds. The part of the community they displease is the same at every rework.

> [{quoted}](name=Commando Galio,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=6gEa7wIf,comment-id=0009,timestamp=2017-03-08T02:58:53.810+0000)
>
> Wrong, original commando galio WAS the best skin, his splash art had the whole "deal with it" vibe. Now that, along with my favorite champ (and name) are completely fucked. Fucking shit devs.

hahaha. silly boi, gatekeeper galio was always the best skin.{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}

Have to disagree as no skin in my eyes beats Elementalist Lux and how much work was put into that but i can see where you're coming from.

The only thing i don't understand is if he's evil or not. I mean he devours souls..
E. Lux is ultimate this is legendary. Compare it more with infernal  Nasus.
I was comparing it to "I am 100% confident in saying Gatekeeper Galio is now the coolest skin in the game".
His exaggerated titel  was just a clickbait, darling.
And my point stands. Also, i think clickbait shouldn't be approved on the Boards in that case. You have to draw a line somewhere.

It isnt really ofc. Just his opinion, many seems to share. But the titel reminded me of brofresco somehow - dont know why. 

https://i.ytimg.com/vi/T_pyOE0_B8E/maxresdefault.jpg

Bro...fresco...riight. THAT guy.

Let's just say the last time i read his name on the Boards, it wasn't accompanied by kind remarks.
His voiceover is a gift from the makers.
It's beautiful, I just pray he fits my playstyle. Grinding him to level 5 asap.

Given your track record with playing mostly mages.
Eh...

After four games with him on the PBE I can say that he feels more like a Maokai and less like a Mage

"I find you guilty, of being a rock monster"

Hypocrite Galio much?
So will new galio be AD or AP?
AP, obviously, but mostly tank and that's the issue.
Why downvote him? He just asked a simple question...

may I say my opinion?  if not, I will simply say that I think Udyr's recent skin (can't remember the name) looks much better both in client and in particle effects in game

to me, this kind of looks like they couldn't decide how to color the champion or what theme to give, so they gave him a bit of everything

this would actually make a better skin for Aatrox than Galio
Good thing I have the skin fragment ready to go :^)

Don't get me wrong, Gatekeeper Galio is a fantastic skin, one of the best.

That being said, I kind of prefer Commando Galio. He just looks awesome and is the best commando skin out there.
it will be. until pool party urgot is out
I absolutely love the rework, although I would tweak the face a bit....it is incredibly non-distinct.

When you disenchanted a Gatekeeper Galio shard to get your Mecha Zero Sion {{item:3073}} 

~~No regrets but still~~
Lol I got a Gatekeeper Galio shard over the weekend. Was going to disenchant it but now thinking about disenchanting some other skins to get the Galio.
Looks like a peacock. Definitely an improvement over the default skin, but that's not saying much.

I like the VO and particles (the wings and his E OMG <3) the most in this skin. Only thing I don't like are his new horns - with the old ones he could ve looked more like a "Balrog".

But imo this, standard and especially Enchanted (with later added particles) are my favourites.
